sub_topic: Synthesis of aspirin from salicylic acid and acetic anhydride
message_1: What is the balanced equation for the synthesis of aspirin from salicylic acid and acetic anhydride?
message_2:
The balanced equation for the synthesis of aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) from salicylic acid and acetic anhydride is:

C7H6O3 (salicylic acid) + C4H6O3 (acetic anhydride) â†’ C9H8O4 (aspirin) + C2H4O2 (acetic acid)
